title: CLEAR_AMBIENT_ZONE_STATE
content:
0x218DD44AAAC964FF0xCDFF3C82// ClearAmbientZoneState
void CLEAR_AMBIENT_ZONE_STATE(char* zoneName, BOOL forceUpdate);Parameters:zoneName: the zone name to clearforceUpdate: Whether ot not to force a zone to become disabled even if its currently activeResets the ambient zone enabled/disabled status to its value before it was modified by this scriptDefault behaviour is that any state change only gets applied once the player leaves the zone.
codeBlocks:
// ClearAmbientZoneState
void CLEAR_AMBIENT_ZONE_STATE(char* zoneName, BOOL forceUpdate);

-- Example usage for CLEAR_AMBIENT_ZONE_STATE
ClearAmbientZoneState('', false)
